definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Log immediately to intranet TOC module each service request received from all above channels.
sentences.chinese: 將上述各種渠道的報修在公司內部網登錄到TOC。

sentences.english: The user has no connectivity to the corporate intranet while away from the office.
sentences.chinese: 離開辦公室後，用戶與公司內部網沒有任何連接。

sentences.english: The user at home can access his company's intranet by dial-up authentication.
sentences.chinese: 用戶在家裏可以通過撥號驗證訪問他公司的內部網。

sentences.english: Assume the requester is sending its messages to a service outside the company's intranet.
sentences.chinese: 假定請求方要將其消息發送到企業內部網之外的服務。

sentences.english: What are the benefits of internal and external networks to provide for your business.
sentences.chinese: 有什麼好處內部網和外部網提供給您的業務。
